work.name: La Bobine
work.description:
“La Bobine” is an innovative app for movie lovers, making it easy to find a movie experience close to you without the hassle of having to look at multiple places.
With a user-centric and mobile-first approch, I helped “La Bobine” with a complete redesign on its app. Creating a new design system that fits with the components library already used (Mandine, React).

work.name: Tankobon
work.description:
“Tankobon” aims to help manga fans manage their collections.
I worked on “Tankobon” and created its identity and visual language.. From an idea, my role was to create a completly new user experience and interface.

work.name: SESAMm
work.description:
SESAMm is one of the french leading start-up in the fintech ecosystem, aiming to make sense of written articles all over the internet.
I was contracted by SESAMm for more than a year to work on multiple existing products and new ones. Mainly TextReveal, a technical app helping investor make sense of big data from billions of articles. SESAMm quickly raised 34M€ to achieve its goals.
